short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays your bookmarks on simple, customizable pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Bookmarks Startpage' browser extension displays your bookmarks on simple, customizable pages. There are options to customize colors, fonts, and the number of columns used. Note: the default display works best with short bookmark names, and, nested folders where bookmarks are included at the same level and roughly the same amount per folder.
